field.name: proveedor
field.label: COM_SERVIN2_FORM_LBL_COMPRA_PROVEEDOR
field.query: SELECT '' AS `id`, 'COM_SERVIN2_COMPRAS_PROVEEDOR_FILTER' AS `val` UNION SELECT `id` AS `id`, CONCAT(`empresa`, ' ', `nombre`) AS val FROM `#__servin_proveedores2` WHERE state != -2

field.name: pieza
field.label: COM_SERVIN2_FORM_LBL_COMPRA_PIEZA
field.query: SELECT '' AS `id`, 'COM_SERVIN2_COMPRAS_PIEZA_FILTER' AS `val` UNION SELECT `id` AS `id`, CONCAT(`descripcion`, ' ', `hechura`) AS val FROM `#__servin_piezas2` WHERE state != -2
